function_description: Add a new list to the board
initial_state: The user is logged into the 4ga Boards application and is viewing a board.
steps: Locate the 'Add new list' button on the board.
Enter a title for the new list.
Confirm the creation of the new list.
expected_state: A new list is added to the board with the specified title, allowing the user to add cards to this list.
